short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Cashback Alert helps you save money in a quick and convenient way.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Cashback Alert helps you save money in a quick and convenient way. Our app keeps you up to date with all the latest deals through pop-up notifications, without you having to do a thing.


AUTO-DETECT FEATURE
With this feature enabled, we can detect and alert you of any money-saving opportunities around, wherever you are on the web.
